video_prompt: Futuristic city with towering structures emitting dynamic blue light beams skyward. Sleek, high-speed vehicles with glowing trails zip along concentric tracks. Advanced aircraft streak across a vibrant sky, their propulsion systems subtly glowing. Clouds shift and reform in the changing light of dawn/dusk.
image_prompt: Futuristic city megastructure in a vast desert, eye-level angle looking up. Central circular base with towering, reflective metallic skyscrapers emitting blue light beams upwards. Concentric rings with glowing blue tracks, sleek white futuristic trains with blue trails. Warm golden-brown sand dunes under an orange-pink to deep blue sky with scattered clouds. Several flying, streamlined white vehicles with blue glows. High-tech, advanced civilization.
refined_video_prompt: Dynamic blue light beams actively pulse skyward from towering structures. High-speed vehicles ceaselessly zip along concentric tracks, their glowing trails continuously extending. Aircraft streak across the sky, propulsion systems subtly shimmering as they move. Clouds consistently shift and reform, reacting to the evolving light as it transitions from dawn to dusk.
